meteoroids.Meteoroids.gameobjects.physicsobjects

Class PhysicsObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • meteoroids.Meteoroids.gameobjects.GameObject
      • meteoroids.Meteoroids.gameobjects.DUGameObject
        • meteoroids.Meteoroids.gameobjects.physicsobjects.PhysicsObject
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Drawable, IPosition, Updateable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Asteroid, GravityObject, Projectile, Ship

    public abstract class PhysicsObject
extends DUGameObject
implements IPosition
    Abstract game object that is affected by the law of physics. Extends DUGameObject so the PhysicsObject is always drawable and updateable.
    Author:
    vpyyhtia

        public void update(float deltaTime)
        Update object's position, velocity and acceleration with current forces. Clears forces at the end of the method.
        Specified by:

        Overrides:

        Parameters:

      • getRotation

        public static float getRotation(float rotation,
                                float angle,
                                float deltaTime)
        Calculates new rotation with current rotation, new angle and deltaTime. If rotation is greater than 3600 or smaller than -3600, it will be changed back to zero.
